references.name: Anna Radulovski
references.reference: Saimanoj is a skilled Front End Developer passionate about community building and open source.At WomenTech Network, he plays an essential role as a Global Ambassador helping to unite 100000 women in tech to drive change with purpose and impact. We are delighted to have such a strong connector and influencer as part of our network, and we are looking forward to further advance our mission together through the WomenTech Global Conference and other initiatives.
